[Home](./index) &gt; [@jsplumb/core](./core) &gt; [ConnectParams](./core.connectparams)

## ConnectParams interface

Options for the `connect` call on a JsPlumbInstance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConnectParams<E> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [anchor?](./core.connectparams.anchor) | AnchorSpec | <i>(Optional)</i> Spec for the anchor to use for both source and target endpoints. |
|  [anchors?](./core.connectparams.anchors) | \[AnchorSpec, AnchorSpec\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Individual anchor specs for the source/target endpoints. |
|  [connector?](./core.connectparams.connector) | ConnectorSpec | <i>(Optional)</i> Spec for the connector used to paint the connection. |
|  [cost?](./core.connectparams.cost) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Cost of the connection. Defaults to 1. |
|  [cssClass?](./core.connectparams.cssclass) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [data?](./core.connectparams.data) | any | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [deleteEndpointsOnDetach?](./core.connectparams.deleteendpointsondetach) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to delete the connection's endpoints when this connection is detached. Defaults to false. Does not delete endpoints if they have other connections. |
|  [deleteEndpointsOnEmpty?](./core.connectparams.deleteendpointsonempty) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to delete any endpoints that were created by this connect call if at some point in the future the endpoint has no remaining connections. Defaults to false. |
|  [detachable?](./core.connectparams.detachable) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not the connection is detachable. Defaults to true. |
|  [directed?](./core.connectparams.directed) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not the connection is considered to be 'directed' |
|  [endpoint?](./core.connectparams.endpoint) | EndpointSpec | <i>(Optional)</i> Spec for the endpoint to use for both source and target endpoints. |
|  [endpointHoverStyle?](./core.connectparams.endpointhoverstyle) | EndpointStyle | <i>(Optional)</i> Spec for the styles to use on both source and target endpoints when they are in hover state |
|  [endpointHoverStyles?](./core.connectparams.endpointhoverstyles) | \[EndpointStyle, EndpointStyle\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Individual specs for the source/target endpoint styles when they are in hover state. |
|  [endpoints?](./core.connectparams.endpoints) | \[EndpointSpec, EndpointSpec\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Individual endpoint specs for the source/target endpoints. |
|  [endpointStyle?](./core.connectparams.endpointstyle) | EndpointStyle | <i>(Optional)</i> Spec for the styles to use on both source and target endpoints |
|  [endpointStyles?](./core.connectparams.endpointstyles) | \[EndpointStyle, EndpointStyle\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Individual specs for the source/target endpoint styles. |
|  [hoverClass?](./core.connectparams.hoverclass) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [hoverPaintStyle?](./core.connectparams.hoverpaintstyle) | PaintStyle | <i>(Optional)</i> Paint style for the connector when in hover mode. |
|  [id?](./core.connectparams.id) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [label?](./core.connectparams.label) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional label to set on the connection. In the default browser UI implementation this is rendered as a <code>label</code> attribute on the SVG element representing the connection. |
|  [outlineStroke?](./core.connectparams.outlinestroke) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [outlineWidth?](./core.connectparams.outlinewidth) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [overlays?](./core.connectparams.overlays) | Array&lt;OverlaySpec&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional list of overlays to attach to the connection. |
|  [paintStyle?](./core.connectparams.paintstyle) | PaintStyle | <i>(Optional)</i> Paint style for the connector. |
|  [ports?](./core.connectparams.ports) | \[string, string\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional port IDs for the source and target endpoints |
|  [reattach?](./core.connectparams.reattach) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to reattach this connection automatically should it be detached via user intervention. Defaults to false. |
|  [scope?](./core.connectparams.scope) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [source?](./core.connectparams.source) | Element \| [Endpoint](./core.endpoint) | <i>(Optional)</i> Source for the connection - an Endpoint, or an element |
|  [target?](./core.connectparams.target) | Element \| [Endpoint](./core.endpoint) | <i>(Optional)</i> Source for the connection - an Endpoint, or an element |
|  [type?](./core.connectparams.type) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Type of the connection. Used in conjunction with the <code>registerConnectionType</code> method. |
|  [uuids?](./core.connectparams.uuids) | \[[UUID](./core.uuid)<!-- -->, [UUID](./core.uuid)<!-- -->\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional UUIDs to assign to the source and target endpoints. |
